title: About
text:
Hi, I‚Äôm Murad, a certified data analyst with a background in statistics and over two years of experience working with financial data.
I specialize in using SQL, R, and Power BI to transform messy datasets into clear insights that businesses can act on.

Skills & Tools

Programming & Data: R, SQL, Excel, Access, VBA
Analysis: Descriptive & inferential statistics, data cleaning
Visualization & Reporting: Power BI, R Shiny, dashboards, presentations
Certification: DataCamp Certified Data Analyst 



Beyond Data
Outside of work, I enjoy playing video games (Persona 5 Royal, God of War). I‚Äôm also a big fan of movies like Inception and Jackie Brown, which inspire me with their memorable characters and immerse worlds.
